Class Raycast

java.lang.Object

public class Raycast
extends FoV

Uses the simple and fast raycasting algorithm to calculate line of sight.

Method Detail

calcFoV

protected java.util.Set<Coord> calcFoV(World world,
                                       int x,
                                       int y,
                                       int r)
Description copied from class: FoV
Performs the actual calculation of field of vision. This method should consider the field to be a square with length 2 * r, centered at (x, y).

Specified by:
calcFoV in class FoV
Parameters:
world - the world on which (x, y) refers to
x - the x value of the center of the field of vision
y - the y value of the center of the field of vision
r - the range of the field of vision
Returns:
the location of all the visible tiles from (x, y)
